short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real-time reports & alerts on your eCommerce competition's marketing efforts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
StoreFilter extension is a service of StoreFilter.com for paid users and free users to access e-commerce site data and rankings for stores. 

The free package includes some information that has been reserved only for our paid users, which anyone can access on a free 7 day trial.

StoreFilter extension detects the URL and checks to see if that is a store that is shown on StoreFilter.com as an account. StoreFilter has over 2.6m stores on the platform, and is continuing to add new stores every week. 

This is the beta version of our brand new app, so we ask if you have any issues, please contact us so we can help to resolve the issues you might be having.
